column4: can anyone help me install java?  I am trying to follow the instructions to build the .deb and am getting "No matching plugin was found."
are you trying to instal Sun Java ? because if you are it's already availble from the repos....
do you know the package name or where it is categorized?
do you have the multiverse repositorys enabled ?
thanks...it looks like it was already installed? o_O??
ermm...it's there, you might want to refer to this forum post---> http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=186317&highlight=Sun+Java
if you have synaptic open... top left corner.... button labeled "Reload".... push it
ok, did that, it still can't find sun-java5-bin
ermmm....dunno if it's availble for breezy
IcemanV9: thanks for the help, it seems like I can't do this in Ubuntu Breezy :P
